ActiveConnectionCount.Name: active_connection_count
ActiveConnectionCount.Help: The total number of concurrent active TCP connections through the NAT gateway

BytesInFromDestination.Name: bytes_in_from_destination
BytesInFromDestination.Help: The number of bytes received by the NAT gateway from the destination

BytesInFromSource.Name: bytes_in_from_source
BytesInFromSource.Help: The number of bytes received by the NAT gateway from clients

BytesOutToDestination.Name: bytes_out_to_destination
BytesOutToDestination.Help: The number of bytes sent out through the NAT gateway to the destination

BytesOutToSource.Name: bytes_out_to_source
BytesOutToSource.Help: The number of bytes sent through the NAT gateway to the clients

ConnectionAttemptCount.Name: connection_attempt_count
ConnectionAttemptCount.Help: The number of connection attempts made through the NAT gateway

ConnectionEstablishedCount.Name: connection_established_count
ConnectionEstablishedCount.Help: The number of connections established through the NAT gateway

ErrorPortAllocation.Name: error_port_allocation
ErrorPortAllocation.Help: The number of times the NAT gateway could not allocate a source port

IdleTimeoutCount.Name: idle_timeout_count
IdleTimeoutCount.Help: The number of connections that transitioned from the active state to the idle state

PacketsDropCount.Name: packets_drop_count
PacketsDropCount.Help: The number of packets dropped by the NAT gateway

PacketsInFromDestination.Name: packets_in_from_destination
PacketsInFromDestination.Help: The number of packets received by the NAT gateway from the destination

PacketsInFromSource.Name: packets_in_from_source
PacketsInFromSource.Help: The number of packets received by the NAT gateway from clients

PacketsOutToDestination.Name: packets_out_to_destination
PacketsOutToDestination.Help: The number of packets sent out through the NAT gateway to the destination

PacketsOutToSource.Name: packets_out_to_source
PacketsOutToSource.Help: The number of packets sent through the NAT gateway to the clients

PeakBytesPerSecond.Name: peak_bytes_per_second
PeakBytesPerSecond.Help: The highest 10-second bytes per second average

PeakPacketsPerSecond.Name: peak_packets_per_second
PeakPacketsPerSecond.Help: The highest 10-second packets per second average
